nodes.title: Basic tech tree viewing
nodes.details: Enable viewing of basic tech trees.

nodes.title: Multiple dependencies
nodes.details: Allow a single node to have multiple dependencies.

nodes.title: Groups
nodes.details: Visually group nodes together, as well as allow dependencies on entire groups.

nodes.title: File format
nodes.details: Read models from a persistent on-disk file format

nodes.title: Canvas panning
nodes.details: Basic camera functionality, such as panning and zooming

nodes.title: Cross-group dependencies
nodes.details: Allow nodes to have dependencies on other groups, or other nodes inside another group

nodes.title: Node descriptions
nodes.details: Give nodes descriptions and a details view that shows it

nodes.title: Node progress rings
nodes.details: Give nodes progression, and display it as a ring on the node bubble

nodes.title: Graph optimization and pruning
nodes.details: Trim unnecessary lines by doing graph pre-optimization before rendering

nodes.title: Edit mode
nodes.details: Allow direct editing of the model by manipulating nodes and dependencies
